mapper.select: SELECT h.name,co.cname,a.contentID,a.appealContent,a.status,c.sno,s.name,DATE_FORMAT(a.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time FROM appeal a JOIN content c ON a.contentID = c.contentID JOIN homework h ON c.homeworkID = h.homeworkID JOIN course co ON h.cno = co.cno JOIN student s ON c.sno = s.id WHERE co.tno = #{id};
